title: On Our Watch: Conduct Unbecoming
description: One officer in Los Angeles used car inspections to hit on women. Three hundred miles away in the San Francisco Bay Area, another woman says an officer used police resources to harass and stalk her.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: On Our Watch: Conduct Unbecoming
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: How do departments treat victims who come forward and deal with officers who cross the line? Why hasn't the #MeToo movement reached policing?
itunes:subtitle: How do departments treat victims who come forward and deal with officers who cross the line? Why hasn't the #MeToo movement reached policing?
content:encoded: One officer in Los Angeles used car inspections to hit on women. Three hundred miles away in the San Francisco Bay Area, another woman says an officer used police resources to harass and stalk her.
